name: The Superior Collection Volume 2
overview: A compilation of 8 single player games released on cassette and floppy disk formats. As with the first volume, it comprised 7 previously published titles as well as a new one (Kix) all by Superior Software. Battle Tank, a scrolling shooter by Mark Silver (1983) Crazy Painter (aka Amidar), a maze game by Adrian Stephens (1983) Deathstar, a scrolling shooter by Peter Johnson (1985) Kix, a Qix style avoid them game by Alwyn Adolf (1987) Missile Strike, a gallery space shooter by Charles Robertson (1984) Overdrive, a car driving game by Peter Johnson (1984) Repton 2, a scrolling maze game by Tim Tyler (1985) Space Pilot, a scrolling shooter by Peter Johnson and David Lovekin (1984)
